snippet: Outside St. Peter’s Basilica, thousands of people huddled under umbrellas, ensnared in a strange limbo, waiting to learn the identity of their new pope.
abstract: Choice of Jorge Mario Bergoglio to become next Pope surprises many outside St Peter's Basilica in Vatican City who had been waiting with rapt anticipation for announcement; Bergoglio's first remarks as Pope Francis, humble and grandfatherly in tone, win cheers from crowd.
lead_paragraph: Outside St. Peter’s Basilica, thousands of people huddled under umbrellas, ensnared in a strange limbo, waiting to learn the identity of their new pope.

headline.main: A Surprise Choice From Afar, Winning Over Some Skeptics
headline.print_headline: A Surprise Choice From Afar, Winning Over Some Skeptics
